document.full_text: seven estonians riding bicycles in lebanon's bekaa valley were kidnapped by masked gunmen on wednesday, security sources said, a rare incident of its kind since the lebanese civil war.
document.title: estonians kidnapped in lebanon's bekaa valley
lines_and_colors: seven estonians riding bicycles in lebanon's bekaa valley were kidnapped by masked gunmen on wednesday, security sources said, a rare incident of its kind since the lebanese civil war.
